items.sentence: Tom told me that I needed to be more aggressive.
Tom told me that he sells about 300 cars a year.
I started to learn French in junior high school.
While you\'re waiting, why don\'t you read this?
Tom has been told never to come back here again.
Tom has enough money to buy everything he wants.
Tom has enough money to do anything he wants to.
Tom has gotten pretty good at playing the cello.
You cannot make an omelet without breaking eggs.
With Tom on our team, we\'re more likely to win.
